SELECT hotel_id "hotelId", room_name "roomName", "room_price" "price", room_standard_person_number "standardNumber", ROOM_CHILD_MAX_NUMBER "childMaxNumber", room_info "roomInfo", room_detail "roomDetail", "rate"."price_rate" "priceRate", "rate"."food_rate" "foodRate", "rate"."service_rate" "serviceRate", "rate"."clean_rate" "cleanRate", "rate"."location_rate" "locationRate" FROM (SELECT hotel_id, room_name, room_id, r.room_price*(1 + pp.price_peak_season + pp.price_weekday + pp.price_breakfast) "room_price", room_standard_person_number, ROOM_CHILD_MAX_NUMBER, room_info, room_detail FROM rooms r left outer join price_policy pp using(price_policy_id) WHERE hotel_id IN(SELECT hotel_id FROM hotels left outer join locations using(location_id) WHERE location_name like '%'||#{value}||'%')
AND r.room_price*(1 + pp.price_peak_season + pp.price_weekday + pp.price_breakfast) > #{minMoney}
AND r.room_price*(1 + pp.price_peak_season + pp.price_weekday + pp.price_breakfast) < #{maxMoney}
AND room_standard_person_number >= #{adultNumber} AND room_child_max_number >= #{childNumber}) left outer join (select hotel_id, round(avg(review_price_rate),2) "price_rate", round(avg(review_food_rate),2) "food_rate", round(avg(review_service_rate),2) "service_rate", round(avg(review_clean_rate),2) "clean_rate", round(avg(review_location_rate),2) "location_rate" from reviews group by hotel_id) "rate" using(hotel_id) WHERE
(( "rate"."price_rate" + "rate"."service_rate" + "rate"."food_rate" + "rate"."clean_rate" + "rate"."location_rate" ) / 5) > #{hotelRate} AND
("rate"."price_rate") > #{hotelRate} AND
("rate"."clean_rate") > #{hotelRate} AND
("rate"."service_rate") > #{hotelRate} AND
("rate"."food_rate") > #{hotelRate} AND
("rate"."location_rate") > #{hotelRate} AND
To_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{startDay} and room_id NOT IN(SELECT room_id FROM reservations WHERE room_id in(select room_id from rooms where hotel_id in(SELECT hotel_id FROM hotels left outer join locations using(location_id) WHERE location_name = #{value}) AND room_standard_person_number >= #{adultNumber} AND room_child_max_number >= #{childNumber}) AND reservation_status <= 399 AND ( ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > #{startDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{startDay} ) OR ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{endDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < #{endDay} ) OR ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{endDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{startDay} ) or (To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{endDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startDay} ) )) GROUP BY hotel_id, room_name, "room_price", room_standard_person_number, ROOM_CHILD_MAX_NUMBER, room_info, room_detail, "rate"."price_rate", "rate"."food_rate", "rate"."location_rate", "rate"."service_rate", "rate"."clean_rate" order by ("rate"."price_rate" + "rate"."food_rate"+"rate"."location_rate"+ "rate"."service_rate"+"rate"."clean_rate"), "room_price"
